author: andschwa
body:
This resolves #817.

A PowerShell instance is created to load and execute profile code.
However, if the profile has a parse error, the instance never gets
created, thus we have to check that it's not null before disposing it.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @palladia It's certainly on the server or this PR couldn't exist... please git fetch.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Fetch did the trick.  I tried it, and it looks good.  Approved.

title: Fix bug when loading bad profiles
